name: VoxCom
description:
A turn-based strategy game inspired by XCOM UFO Defence. Uses an isometric perspective with pixel art.

Currently in extremely early alpha, with regular updates planned. 

You can read on the development here. Donations help me work on the game longer, but are by no means mandatory. 

Current Features
  • Very simple AI which freezes the game somewhat while it thinks (this will be fixed soon).
  • Unit movement and shooting
  • Unit health, energy, and accuracy
  • 3 different weapons
  • Turns
  • A single testing map
  • Simple graphics, with bullets that fly through the air and animated units
How to Play ActionBindingRotate cameraE and QMove cameraWASD, up/down arrowsFine aim/slice wallsLeft shift (Hold)Select unitLeft clickMove selected unitRight click once to preview the path, then again to start movingTurn selected unit towardsLeft clickShoot at positionLeft click after selecting firemode via the GUI

The in-game GUI allows you to cycle between units with the arrow buttons, and centre the camera on the current unit by clicking on its name. Available weapon firemodes will appear on this GUI depending on the equipped weapon of the selected unit. Clicking on one of these firemode buttons starts aiming mode.
